name: Napoleonics
overview: Napoleonics is a compilation of three Dr. Turcan's strategy games: Waterloo, Borodino & Austerlitz. The presentation and interface is identical in all of them: you are observing the battle area through a 3D perspective, while issuing commands by typing in certain pre-defined text elements (combined with names of commanders, places and time of execution). You may play both sides. It is also possible to play a two player game, or to take neither side (watching the computer playing both sides).
